response:
For healthy breakfast options, I recommend the following products:

1. **DIET BREAKFAST - Ragi Idli Instant Mix | Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix | Multi Millet Upma Mix**  
   [View Product](https://millex.in/products/diet-breakfast-ragi-idli-instant-mix-sprouted-ragi-masala-dosa-mix-multi-millet-upma-mix-total-1200g-each-400g)  
   This mix includes ragi and multi millets, which are rich in fiber and nutrients, making it a healthy choice for breakfast.

2. **TASTY BREAKFAST - Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix | Sprouted Ragi Masala Dosa Mix | Millet Rava Idli Instant Mix**  
   [View Product](https://millex.in/products/tasty-breakfast-multi-millets-dosa-instant-mix-sprouted-ragi-masala-dosa-mix-millet-rava-idli-instant-mix-total-1200g-each-400g)  
   Similar to the diet option, this mix also focuses on millets and ragi, providing a nutritious start to your day.

3. **BREAKFAST COMBO - Multi Millets Dosa Instant Mix | Multi Millet Upma Mix | Millet Rava Idli Instant Mix**  
   [View Product](https://millex.in/products/breakfast-combo-multi-millets-dosa-instant-mix-multi-millet-upma-mix-millet-rava-idli-instant-mix-total-1200g-each-400g)  
   This combo offers a variety of healthy options, ensuring you can enjoy different meals throughout the week while still focusing on health.

These products fit your preference for healthy breakfasts as they are made from whole grains and millets, which are known for their health benefits.
